name: Online Friends
description:
Congrats, you have been chosen to test the new Online Friends Virtual Experience. This game (if you could call it that) helps new people make new friends by chatting to online bots. Then they can use those skills to be interactive around others in real life! Come on! Play it!

This will come in four different chapters with multiple endings. Can you make the right choices and survive..?

This uses a lot of free models cause I can't hire anyone lol
